extendedInfo.description: Important: This application is a locked application intended for our Kickstarter backers and pre-order customers ONLY.Please submit any bugs here - http://chameleonlauncher.com/support/bugs/ or contact support@chameleonlauncher.comNew customers must purchase Chameleon at https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.chameleonlauncherIf you want the phone only version you can go herehttps://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.chameleonlauncher.phone

reviews.title: Cleared settings?
reviews.comment: Seems when it gets kicked out of memory it forgets the homescreen and I have to set it up again. Just started happening today
reviews.author: Matthew b

reviews.title: Battery Drain, Resource Hog
reviews.comment: Limited functionality (no new widgets in like forever), battery drain, resource hog.  Just not good.  So much wasted potential.  Waste of my Kickstarter dollars.
reviews.author: Jason Krellner

reviews.title: Latest updates improved
reviews.comment: Overall performance is now much better. The only thing you need to work on next is: A. Speed up the loading time after going to the home screen from an app B. Let us edit the power widget hot spots
reviews.author: Alexander De Lancker

reviews.title: Doesn\'t save settings.
reviews.comment: Every time I set up a homescreen, hitting the homescreen selector (bottom-right button) clears the configuration! So frustrating.
reviews.author: Patrick Rowley

reviews.title: What is this?
reviews.comment: I remember paying $10 for this. I wish I could get a refund.
reviews.author: Vipin Gungaram

reviews.title: Has potential
reviews.comment: Let me be very clear: I do not regret kickstarting this for one second and I love the concept. Sadly, it REALLY drains battery in it\'s current incarnation. Cannot wait for future versions that polish up the little niggles!
reviews.author: Gil Hamlin

reviews.title: Very poor
reviews.comment: I backed up this project on kickstarter and I\'m totally regretting it. This launcher is far worse than even the stock ones I tried: very poor customization choices, few native widgets (sure everybody can make his own but we\'re not all programmers), native android widgets disappear randomly, no chance to make folders or change icons, furthermore it takes AGES to load at boot time and when I close any app. This launcher is like a politician: it promised lots of nice stuff, got all our money, and now it\'s realizing 1/10 of what was promised. Very very poor.
reviews.author: Lorenzo Maffeo

reviews.title: Hands Down Best For My Nexus
reviews.comment: I tended to change launchers on my phone as boredom set in. Chameleon is a functional beast that works so well as to appear seamless. No lag or issues of any sort...none. I have my screens divided into a news page, a twitter page etc. So rather than the phone launchers which are to look at, this is for function and usefulness. Since it works for me so well, I tend not to think of it as an extra app, but a integral part of my tablet. Boredom, schmoredom.  This thing is great.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: New and different
reviews.comment: The UI is very diffrent from what you are used to in Android, it takes a while to get used to. I forced myself to use Chameleon as my daily lanucher for a couple of weeks and I liked it more and more. There are however to major issues: 1. The widgets are loading quite slow after wakeup which is really annoying and 2. The lack of widgets. The ability to use \"ordinary\" widgets helps, but chamelon really needs more of it\'s own beautiful widgets. If you think the UI and layout looks interesting I can definitly recommend you buying this launcher. Give it a wholehearty try and I think you\'ll love it. And hopefully it will get better over time.
reviews.author: Jesper Jacobsson

reviews.title: Great concept? Maybe. Poor execution? Yes.
reviews.comment: I was excited for Chameleon.  I pre-ordered it.  It was a waste of $10, definitely.  I\'m running it on an Asus Transformer TF101 (original), so maybe the terrible performance is partly my fault, but Chameleon is slow, takes forever to boot-up, crashes, refuses to properly switch between profiles (defeating half of it\'s functionality) and ultimately just doesn\'t realize its vision of a better tablet interface.    Make-a-widget seemed like an answer to some of this, but developer interest seems to have completely fallen off.  Nobody is making anything or updating their old widgets.  Back to ADW after on-and-off attempts to make this work for me.  Not worth the frustration, even for the money I sunk in.  Hope it gets better.
reviews.author: Doak Jantzen

reviews.title: Wow!
reviews.comment: UPDATE: Dev is at version 1.01 and this is no where close to a daily driver esp n the Nexus 7. I am pulling down my rating....this isn\'t beta anymore. I still love the multiple home screens for different areas, and the native android widgets, but it still seems lacking.  Update for version 2: I can\'t even use this launcher. I wanted to love Chameleon, but now all it does is freeze, and lock up my Nexus 7. The app constantly drops the Facebook, Instagram....
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Too many bugs
reviews.comment: TF101 ics Staying with Nova &ADW Widgets In since Kickstarter......can\'t be bothered......other things to do. Either it works perfectly or it doesn\'t. It doesn\'t. And three months later......zilch.......they say they have other clients/projects which consume their time.......companies plan & budget.....staff accordingly....they don\'t make claims which are beyond ability to meet. Kickstarter investors are clients also but expected to stay patient while the important clients are dealt with.....not quite matching the promo stuff pumped out wit revolutionary hype. Time to man up and admit you have failed to deliver.  Not fit for purpose at present.....after so long. Shame really....it really did look like you had a great idea.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: OVERRATED LAUNCHER
reviews.comment: The dev is stupid.. !! Overrated launcher.. even nova apex etc still better than this... looks like they abusing with some overrated promotion... until u paid n realize this is the worst ever launcher in history..
reviews.author: Wimbo Mahadi

reviews.title: A nice start
reviews.comment: But much to be done. Has a tendency to completely lock up and need a reboot. Nexus 10.
reviews.author: Umar Mustafa

reviews.title: Multi million$ idea wasted
reviews.comment: Where the hell are the updates guys? I\'m debating picketing outside your offices, we demand a polished app
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Schlechter Dev
reviews.comment: Seit Wochen keine Updates, geschweige denn neue Widdgets und das obwohl es noch an allen Ecken und Kanten fehlt.
reviews.author: Janis Mollemeier

reviews.title: Kick starter backer
reviews.comment: It has gotten much better. The speed is actually comparable to other launchers. I like the new look too but the low res graphics could be better.
reviews.author: Aleksander Zywot

reviews.title: Buggy
reviews.comment: When it works on my TF101, it\'s great but it simply crashes to frequently to use. Let me know when it works.
reviews.author: Gregory Jensen

reviews.title: Not quite
reviews.comment: It needs a lot more widgets.
reviews.author: Patrick Noble
